structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.catch_line: KRS 63.080(2) applicable to board of regents.
law.text: KRS 63.080(2) hereby is expressly made applicable to members of the board of regents of each of said universities or colleges.
law.history: Created 1956 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, Art. XIV, sec. 2.
